sentences.en: " Oh, if I only had a brass andiron - knob again!
sentences.cn: “ 哦, 我要是再能得到那只柴架上的铜把手就好了!

sentences.en: He grabbed at the knob and pulled vigorously.
He shook at the knob, but the door was locked.
sentences.cn: 他摇了摇门把手, 但是门锁住了.

sentences.en: He thought the door was locked, but he turned the knob and the door opened.
sentences.cn: 他本以为门是锁住的，但是转了一下把手门就开了。

sentences.en: He turned the knob and pushed against the door.
He turned the knob and the door burst open.
sentences.cn: 他转动球形把手,门猛地开了.

sentences.en: He twiddled with the radio knob until he found the right programme.
sentences.cn: 他转动了一会收音机旋钮才找到了合意的节目。

sentences.en: I adjusted the volume knob and sat down.
sentences.cn: 我调节好音量旋钮，坐了下来。

sentences.en: it is the rock ‘n’ roll statement with knobs on.
sentences.cn: 更有甚者还有摇滚的言论。
我收音机上的旋钮松动了.

sentences.en: The cutters are opened by turning the knob anticlockwise.
sentences.cn: 逆时针转动旋钮可以开启切割机。

sentences.en: There is a knob of butter on the table.
This knob is only held on by sellotape.
sentences.cn: 这个旋钮只是用透明胶带固定住的.

sentences.en: To switch the oven on, turn the knob, and bob's your uncle!
sentences.cn: 把烤箱的电源接通, 转动旋钮, 完事大吉!

sentences.en: Top the steaming hot potatoes with a knob of butter.
sentences.cn: 在冒热气的马铃薯上放一小块黄油。

sentences.en: With his left hand he groped for the knob, turned it, and pulled the door open.
sentences.cn: 他左手摸索着门把手，转动一下，然后推开门。

words.tran_cn: 有节的；多疙瘩的；流行的；棘手的（等于knobby）
多节的；多瘤的；多疙瘩的
鼓起（knob的过去式和过去分词）
从采出的石料中去除碎块

phrases.tran_cn: (英，非正式)不仅如此，更有甚者

trans.tran_cn: 球形把手，（收音机等的）旋钮，小块，疙瘩
trans.tran_en: a round handle or thing that you turn to open a door, turn on a television etc
